Mod2_Description: If {c_important}Flurry{/c} hits any {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy it will make all enemies hit by that cast {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} seconds.
Mod0_Description: Each time {c_important}Flurry{/c} damages a Crowd Controlled or {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy, you are Healed for {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * {SF_8})]){/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_6}*{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * {SF_8} * {SF_6}]){/c} per cast.
Mod1_Description: Evading through an enemy will cause your next {c_important}Flurry{/c} to Stun enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:STUN}{/c} seconds.
name: Flurry
